message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this deal before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, my turn. Inflation is a factor, but so is fairness. Let's split it closer to even this time.
Bob, inflation is hitting you hard! This is a better deal than you'll see in round 4, trust me.
Alice, this is my final offer.  Take it before inflation eats away even more of my share!
